EmailTemplate.name: Victor Email 2.Victor Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, got a second?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I want to introduce myself again, my name is Victor and I’ll be supporting your company’s account from now on. I want to take a moment to once again say an official hello.
I’ve researched your company, and I’m thrilled to be working with you. I want to let you know that I have ideas on some solutions that I feel would benefit your business.
I’d love to connect with you to discuss this. Are you available sometime for a quick chat?
Thanks,
Victor Cheung Inside Account Manager
We have the business solutions to help you operate in the new normal.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 416-401-6300 ext. 86406 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878 <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878]]>
